FuncDef:
The vpn-instance command adds a PKI to a specified VPN.
The undo vpn-instance command unbinds a PKI from a specified VPN. The vpn-instance command adds a PKI to a specified VPN. The undo vpn-instance command unbinds a PKI from a specified VPN. By default, a PKI does not belong to any VPN.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a VPN instance.
This parameter is supported in the public system only.
The VPN instance name must exist.
